Headline: #169 69th/UPS Express Temporary Reroute at 79th/Central Park
ShortDescription: #169 69th/UPS Express buses are rerouted via 79th, Lawndale, 83rd, Columbus. 79th, then resume their normal route due to street blockage near 79th/Central Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#169 69th/UPS Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Lawndale, 83rd, Columbus. 79th, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to street blockage near 79th/Central Park.
